alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 3:38PM MDT until April 04 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 11 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 11 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor recreation could become life threatening to those caught unprepared for severe winter conditions. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented. Frostbite and hypothermia can develop quickly.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
